img_above_text:
![Wukong YellowFlower 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/06/Wukong_YellowFlower_20.jpg)
Along with a variety of lunging attacks and dual-wield slashes, he also has a few unorthodox moves. If he tries to headbutt you by leaping on his side, resist the impulses to kick him when he's down. He'll recover from falling to the ground by doing a breakdancing kick spin while slashing with both swords to lift off the ground and damage you if you get close.
img_below_text:
He can also adopt a ready stance and expel projectiles all around him. They'll fly about like angry gnats and threaten to deal several hits, but these are the kind of projectiles you can easily deflect with your staff spin.
![Wukong YellowFlower 25.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3e/Wukong_YellowFlower_25.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 8 from the file 'Commander_Beetle.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong YellowFlower 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/06/Wukong_YellowFlower_20.jpg)
Along with a variety of lunging attacks and dual-wield slashes, he also has a few unorthodox moves. If he tries to headbutt you by leaping on his side, resist the impulses to kick him when he's down. He'll recover from falling to the ground by doing a breakdancing kick spin while slashing with both swords to lift off the ground and damage you if you get close."
            - Following Text: "He can also adopt a ready stance and expel projectiles all around him. They'll fly about like angry gnats and threaten to deal several hits, but these are the kind of projectiles you can easily deflect with your staff spin.
![Wukong YellowFlower 25.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3e/Wukong_YellowFlower_25.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
**Summary:**  
The image depicts a combat encounter with Commander Beetle in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character, Wukong, faces off against the enemy, who is unleashing glowing projectile attacks that scatter across the battlefield like "angry gnats." These projectiles are dangerous but can be deflected using Wukong's staff spin ability. The scene emphasizes the enemy's unique attack patterns and the player's defensive options during this challenging fight. The dialogue at the bottom, "Alone in this endless dark. Come end my life," adds a somber tone to the battle.
